plot: Sumi is an artist. Sumi lives with a piano teacher. They are strangers in a Brooklyn apartment and do anything to get by, until their curiosity lures them into each other's lives.
title: Sumi
plot_es: Sumi is an artist. Sumi lives with a piano teacher. They are strangers in a Brooklyn apartment and do anything to get by, until their curiosity lures them into each other's lives.
plot_en: Sumi is an artist. Sumi lives with a piano teacher. They are strangers in a Brooklyn apartment and do anything to get by, until their curiosity lures them into each other's lives.
